name: HELP THE BRAZILIAN INDIGENOUS MOBILIZATION
description: The godlike figure you see in this painting is Alice Pataxó, activist for the indigenous rights on Brazil. By collecting this piece, you help to support the biggest indigenous mobilization on the country's history going on right now in 2021. People are having their lands and lives taken by a cruel political system that predates over nature and human life to make money for the rich. Help the movement by acquiring this piece, all profit goes to the indigenous mobilization going on right now in Brasilia - BR
